sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"连续的，不断的"之意。
means: continual ： 强调重复或持续发生，但连续之间允许有间断。
continuous ： 语意最强，强调在时间和空间上没有间断。
successive ： 强调事物一个接一个地发生，无间断。
constant ： 多指习惯性的重复和不变的持续。
persistent ： 普通用词，可指不懈的努力，也可指任何连续不断或重复出现的事物。

sentence.Network_en: Shoppers picked their way through puddles caused by persistent rain.
sentence.Network_cn: 购物的人们小心翼翼地择路避开由于连续下雨形成的水坑。

sentence.Network_en: His cough grew more persistent until it never stopped.
sentence.Network_cn: 他咳嗽持续的时间越来越长，直到咳个不停。

sentence.Network_en: Persistent damage or inadequate healing may lead to chronic lameness.
sentence.Network_cn: 反复受伤或治疗不当可导致长期跛足。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 持久(Persistent) - 持久(Persistent)的实例在数据库中有对应的记录，并拥有一个持久化标识(identifier)。 持久(Persistent)的实例可.

赵丽——GRE词汇课 - 豆丁网 ... stubborn a 固执的（助记） 是他笨 persistent 固执的 obstinate 固执的.

list.abs: Windows图形编程 ... 15.6 可展开性( Extensibility) 15.7 持久性( Persistence) 15.8 托管( Delegation).
* 的持续性（PERSISTENCE），对象通过写出描述自己状态的数值来记录自己，这个过程叫对象 * 的串行化Serializable。
雅思高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... persist 坚持, 固执 persistency 固执,持续 persistent 持续的; 不断的 52.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... permanent 永久的 persist 坚持 persuade 劝说.
3d max 中英文对照 - 小M的日志 - 网易博客 ... Period 周期 Persist 持续 Perspective 透视；透视图.

entry.tran: （尤指不好或不受欢迎的状态或情况）持续存在的，继续发生的
entry.def: Something that is persistent continues to exist or happen for a long time; used especially about bad or undesirable states or situations.

example.ex: Her position as national leader has been weakened by persistent fears of another coup attempt...
example.tran: 由于人们一直担心会再次发生政变,她的国家领导人地位被削弱了。

example.ex: His cough grew more persistent until it never stopped...
example.tran: 他咳嗽持续的时间越来越长,直到咳个不停。

entry.tran: 执著的；不屈不挠的；锲而不舍的
entry.def: Someone who is persistent continues trying to do something, even though it is difficult or other people are against it.

example.ex: ...a persistent critic of the government's transport policies...
example.tran: 对政府交通政策一直持批评态度的人

example.ex: He phoned again this morning. He's very persistent.
example.tran: 今天早晨他又打来了电话。他非常执著。

sentences.sentence: "the cathedral organ and the distant voices have a haunting beauty"- Claudia Cassidy

auth_sentence.content: She made persistent efforts to do the kind thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: She made persistent efforts to do the kind thing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She made persistent efforts to do the kind thing.

auth_sentence.content: A tireless and persistent campaigner for women's education.
auth_sentence.res_content: A tireless and persistent campaigner for women's education.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A tireless and persistent campaigner for women's education.

auth_sentence.content: I have found...the persistent hum of the traffic...remarkably soothing.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have found...the persistent hum of the traffic...remarkably soothing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have found...the persistent hum of the traffic...remarkably soothing.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

Sentence.sentence: Almost every child, on the first day he sets foot in a school building, is smarter, more curious, less afraid of what he doesn't know, better at finding and figuring things out, more confident, resourceful (机敏的), persistent and independent than he will ever be again in his schooling – or, unless he is very unusual and very lucky, for the rest of his life.
She achieved her fame through persistent advocacy of fake science.

means.word_mean: 持续的; 不断的,连绵的,反复出现的

sentences.en: Albert had a persistent headache that lasted for three days.
sentences.cn: 艾伯特连续头痛了三天。

jushi.english: There was a persistent sound of running water,although he had turned all the taps off.
jushi.chinese: 尽管他已关上了所有的水龙头,但仍有持续不断的流水声。

jushi.english: She felt embarrassed by his persistent attentions.
jushi.chinese: 他不时地向她大献殷勤,使她很难为情。
